items.title: Enable tooltips
items.description: As mentioned above, you must initialize tooltips before they can be used. One way to initialize all tooltips on a page would be to select them by their data-bs-toggle attribute, like so:
items.code:
const tooltipTriggerList = document.querySelectorAll('[data-bs-toggle="tooltip"]')
const tooltipList = [...tooltipTriggerList].map(tooltipTriggerEl => new bootstrap.Tooltip(tooltipTriggerEl))
